text: @PressSec @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump He talks about COVID19 for a little while (inconsistently), blames everyone but himself for HIS delayed response (negligence), rambles incoherently for an hour and a half and of course, mentions his campaign multiple times. If he was helpful in the least we’d listen. He’s NOT.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
